Apple___Apple_scab: Apply fungicides containing myclobutanil or sulfur. Remove and destroy infected leaves.
Apple___Black_rot: Prune infected branches and apply fungicides like captan or thiophanate-methyl.
Apple___Cedar_apple_rust: Apply fungicides such as myclobutanil or triadimefon. Remove nearby cedar trees if possible.
Apple___healthy: No treatment needed. Maintain good plant health practices.
Blueberry___healthy: No treatment needed. Maintain good plant health practices.
Cherry_(including_sour)___Powdery_mildew: Apply fungicides like sulfur or potassium bicarbonate. Improve air circulation.
Cherry_(including_sour)___healthy: No treatment needed. Maintain good plant health practices.
Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray: Apply fungicides containing azoxystrobin or pyraclostrobin. Rotate crops.
Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_: Apply fungicides like propiconazole or tebuconazole. Remove infected plants.
Corn_(maize)___Northern_Leaf_Blight: Apply fungicides containing chlorothalonil or mancozeb. Rotate crops.
Corn_(maize)___healthy: No treatment needed. Maintain good plant health practices.
Grape___Black_rot: Apply fungicides like mancozeb or captan. Remove and destroy infected plant parts.
Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles): Prune infected branches and apply fungicides like thiophanate-methyl.
Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spo: Apply fungicides containing copper or mancozeb. Improve air circulation.
Grape___healthy: No treatment needed. Maintain good plant health practices.
Orange___Haunglongbing_(Citrus_greening): Remove infected trees. Control psyllid vectors with insecticides.
Peach___Bacterial_spot: Apply copper-based bactericides. Prune infected branches.
Peach___healthy: No treatment needed. Maintain good plant health practices.
Pepper,_bell___Bacterial_spot: Apply copper-based bactericides. Rotate crops and avoid overhead watering.
Pepper,_bell___healthy: No treatment needed. Maintain good plant health practices.

Potato___Late_blight: Apply fungicides containing metalaxyl or mancozeb. Remove infected plants.

Raspberry___healthy: No treatment needed. Maintain good plant health practices.
Soybean___healthy: No treatment needed. Maintain good plant health practices.

Tomato___Late_blight: Apply fungicides containing metalaxyl or mancozeb. Remove infected plants.

Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot: Apply fungicides containing chlorothalonil or mancozeb. Remove infected leaves.
Tomato___Spider_mites Two-spotted_spider: Apply miticides like abamectin or spiromesifen. Increase humidity.
Tomato___Target_Spot: Apply fungicides like chlorothalonil or mancozeb. Rotate crops.
Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus: Control whitefly vectors with insecticides. Remove infected plants.
